author: musm
body:
- cmd.exe -- > works (extra space)
- powershell.exe --> works
- pwsh.exe --> doesn't work (i.e. the latest powershell) (python works here)

`> echo test | julia -E "readline(stdin)"`

comments.author: musm
comments.body:
Seems so
```
> echo 'test' | foreach-object { julia -E "println(ARGS[1]);" $_ }
test
nothing
~
 
```

comments.author: musm
comments.body:
@chuanjiao10 how do I make it work if `julia` is the function

`function julia { & "C:\tools\Julia\julia-1.x\bin\julia.exe" $args }`

title: piping to stdin fails on windows using Julia
